AND payment_date BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate}||'000000', 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}||'235959', 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')
AND s.email like '%'||#{searchSales}||'%'

email = #{email}
ORDER BY s.payment_date ) S ) ORDER BY rnum DESC
